item.title: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2007

latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. (text of measure as introduced: CR S148)

item.title: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2007

latestAction.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 401.

item.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E240)
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

summary.text: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2007 - Amends the Internet Tax Freedom Act to make permanent the ban on state and local taxation of Internet access and on multiple or discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce.

bill.title: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2007

item.title: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2007
Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2007
To make the moratorium on Internet access taxes and multiple and discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce permanent.

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
